name: FChaosBreakingEventRequestSettings
doc: Settings used to refine breaking event requests

MaxNumberOfResults: The maximum number of results to return.
MinRadius: The minimum breaking radius threshold for the results.
MinSpeed: The minimum speed threshold for the results.
MinMass: The minimum mass threshold for the results.
MaxDistance: The maximum distance threshold for the results.
SortMethod: The method used to sort the breaking events.
